BarcodeDetector.summary: NOTE Experimental The BarcodeDetector interface of the allows detection of linear and two dimensional barcodes in images.

remarks.para:
-barcodefaq.com: A website with information about different barcodes and examples of the different types.
-Accelerated Shape Detection in Images

BarcodeDetectorBarcodeDetector.summary:
NOTE Experimental The BarcodeDetector() constructor creates
a new object which detects linear and two-dimensional
barcodes in images.

BarcodeDetectorDetect.summary:
NOTE Experimental The detect() method of the
interface returns a {{jsxref('Promise')}} which fulfills
with an of detected barcodes within an image.
BarcodeDetectorDetect.returns:
Returns a which fulfills with an array of
DetectedBarcode objects with the following properties:

BarcodeDetectorGetSupportedFormats.summary:
NOTE Experimental The getSupportedFormats() static method
of the interface returns a {{jsxref('Promise')}} which
fulfills with an of supported barcode format types.
BarcodeDetectorGetSupportedFormats.returns:
A which fulfills with an of
supported barcode format types.
